name: brackets-open-in-linux-terminal
title: Open project in terminal
description:
Open the project folder in terminal. Now supports xfce4-terminal, konsole, gnome-terminal, lxterminal and terminator
Also works on OSX for Terminal and iTerm (thanks to Pauli Price)
Now works in Windows for cmd (thanks to , Joshua McKinney)
author: Ranjan Datta (https://github.com/ranjandatta)
Pauli Price (https://github.com/marfarma)
Joshua McKinney (https://github.com/meeple142)
